globalHeaders.Permissions-Policy: accelerometer=(), camera=(), geolocation=(), gyroscope=(), magnetometer=(), microphone=(), payment=(), usb=()
globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' https://www.building4.cloud https://building4.cloud https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://www.building4.cloud https://fonts.gstatic.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com; img-src 'self' https://building4.cloud
